data.eml:eml: First description of the male of the millipede Eurygyrus euboeus (Verhoeff, 1901) (Diplopoda: Callipodida: Schizopetalidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stoev, Pavel (2007): First description of the male of the millipede Eurygyrus euboeus (Verhoeff, 1901) (Diplopoda: Callipodida: Schizopetalidae). Zootaxa 1447: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.176174
